I received my security deposit today and I was shocked that this company charged me about $200 for different kinds of cleanings - Carpet Cleaning, Wall Painting and Light Clean, which is definitely UNREASONABLE because I have spent lots of times and efforts on cleaning all stuff before I moved out.  Even they charged the cleaning fee, I doubt whether they actually cleaned it because when I moved in, the apartment is not clean at all.

THINK CAREFULLY BEFORE YOU SIGNED LEASE WITH THIS COMPANY!

name: University Group
review_text: I have been living at this apartment since August 2017. The apartment is not glamorous by any means, but comfortable, spacious, and maintained. Maintenance was always prompt and I loved being able to pay rent online. I thoroughly enjoyed living here at Arbor Apartments and would recommend it to anyone! Great location to the business school, quad, bars, etc.

name: University Group
review_text:
Requested for a noise repair on an electronic device (which is abnormal from other same brand, same year device) but neglected after the technician who came to my unit and said 'it's normal'. It is true for a normal old, replace-needed device. They closed my request two times and said "Device is working and they have nothing to do with that noise. I don't hear noise". Yup, it's working, but with abnormal noise which is loud that all visitors can hear and say 'it's really annoying' :(

If you want to live in University Group apartment, you might have to endure some inconvenience or uncomfortable atmosphere, or maybe somehow dangerous environment to your health, in your unit. They might not response to your request and say "We have nothing to do with that"

---------------
Regarding the response posted on 3/15/2021 by the University Group,

I've already requested 3 times and called 2 times for this issue and the University Group rejected the second look. All I got from the University group was "We don’t replace appliances that are in normal working order. Just because it may be an older model doesn’t mean it gets replaced if it’s working as it should".

The point is, I'm not saying the device is "old". The device creates "NOISE" that one of technicians from the University Group can't hear. The device (refrigerator) is 21 years old, but not all 20-year-old refrigerators have this kind of sound. All my friends were surprised for the fact that there exists a technician who says "It's a normal sound" after hearing such "NOISE". In common sense, a device operating with an abnormal "NOISE" should be fixed.

FYI: According to the United States Department of Energy, refrigerators last approximately 12 years. At that point, it's likely time to replace it.

I just want to inform the condition of appliances of the University Group and the maintenance service quality to future customers.
owner_answer:
Jun, this is never what we want to hear. Please come see us at the office, email us at leasing@ugroupcu.com, or call (217) 352-3182 and we'd welcome the chance to take a second look at what's going on here.
Thanks,
-The University Group Team

name: University Group
review_text: Very thorough and speedy maintenance help. I've requested tons of small or big requests and the team would always be kind to fix all these issues one after the other. For example, had my furniture replaced because of a bad smell.

name: University Group
review_text: Returned less than 50% of my security deposit. When I moved in the carpet was dirty. They didn't even bother to clean it until a few months after I had moved in. Then when I moved out, they deducted like $100 from the deposit for "carpet cleaning." They know they are ripping you off because they can.

name: University Group
review_text: The maintenance team are really nice people. Thanks to Cameron, Bill, Cory et al. Replaced my broken AC unit promptly, and thankfully they had emergency temporary units on hand as well. Seemed happy to schedule convenient times for work to be done.

name: University Group
review_text: I have nothing, but great things to say about the maintenance staff! I had multiple issues that needed resolved and within 24 hours all problems were resolved, I was contacted to make sure the work was satisfactory, and I even met one of the maintenance men, Rick, who was very helpful.

name: University Group
review_text: Just had my package stolen and they said there was nothing they could do about it. The entire apartment is covered in spiderwebs and other bugs. Our apartment had so many things that were broken and we had to virtually beg them to come fix the issues

name: University Group
review_text: This company has been very fradulent with giving back security deposits. Both the times I stayed at UGroup apartments, I was charged extra for cleaning and painting when I had cleaned the apartment thoroughly before vacating and hadn't done anything to the walls. They gave me back just around 5% of my deposit back, which is a cruel joke. I would suggest students to give your hard earned money to better leasing companies in Urbana-Champaign who wouldn't loot money in name of security deposits.
owner_answer:
Sneha, thank you for leaving us feedback.
We are sorry that these charges were unexpected.

However, we have a high standard for the cleanliness of our apartment units. The units must be cleaned according to the move-out procedures on our website: https://ugroupcu.com/move-in-move-out/
Those move-out procedures are the same steps that we take to make sure the apartment is clean enough for a new renter or it must be cleaned.

We would love to speak with you about this to see how we might improve.
Please email us at Account.Inquiries@UGroupCU.com.
We look forward to hearing from you.
-The University Group Team

name: University Group
review_text: One maintenance guy named Jeff did a terrific job of installing a new bathroom sink/counter top and cleaning up after himself at my apartment. He left no mess and was also super engaging and friendly to have small-talk with! He has a lot of experiencing of remodeling bathrooms as he worked on 87 in 2016, and I was his 99th bathroom of 2017! Great work!

name: University Group
review_text: The maintenance technician who helped us with our request was very nice and fixed our door quickly. Overall, maintenance is very responsive and they do their job well!
owner_answer:
Thank you, Ellie! We're so glad that our maintenance service was to your liking.
Follow us on social media! @UniversityGroupCU
-The University Group Team

name: University Group
review_text: The maintenance staff are great. I submitted two maintenance requests on a Friday night and someone came out first thing Monday morning. They were very helpful and resolved the issues very quickly.

name: University Group
review_text:
always on time to fix any maintenance issues.

Update: a year on and the quality of maintenance is still the same. I had issues with my stove. Not only did they fix the issue, they changed the drip pans without even asking. super satisfied.

name: University Group
review_text: There's been a ton of improvements with Ugroup, paying online is an absolute breeze now, and the maintenance staff has gotten so much better. The most recent repairs I asked for were all done swiftly, and they stayed for as long as it took (which I really appreciated, rather than have it done in several sessions). Wish I needed to stay longer in Urbana.

name: University Group
review_text: This was our daughter's first apartment.   When we moved her in on Saturday we discovered several issues.   We posted the items on their website.  By Monday the maintenance crew were there to address the issues.   All of them were professional and courteous.   They explained to her each time what they had done.

name: University Group
review_text: I have been impressed by the proactive UGroup’s maintenance staff and was one of the major reasons I am continuing my lease. They are adept on taking care of any issues whether it’s a minor repair or an emergency situation. Additionally, the one bedroom apartments are pretty decent value for money and location is pretty convenient (if you work at Everitt, ECE or Beckman).

name: University Group
review_text: I was a university group tenant last year. I shared the apartment with two other people. I am writing this to express my gross dissatisfaction with the lack of transparency in the billing process after we vacated the apartment. The initial bill, which still exorbitant but had numbers which added up. Later when we requested the security deposit to be returned, new numbers showed up which don't add up. I have paid my share of the amount, but was expecting the Security deposit to be returned, atleast in part. However, it doesn't seem to be possible judging by the response of the administration.

name: University Group
review_text: Lived here for 1 and 1/2 years. I have never received my security deposit back Even though we had cleaned the apartments thoroughly. The apartments are outdated. Avoid the apartments with no centralised A/C as they get unbearably cold in winters and the heating rods dont work efficiently. The only advantage is that the maintenance people are prompt.

name: University Group
review_text: University group is a scammer. stole our security deposit on moving out. We cleaned our room and common areas, including the carpet. The univeristy group charge us $195 on cleaning the carpet and $900 on cleaning the room. This is to say they are taking all our deposit. Basically they try every means to take all your money.
owner_answer:
Hello, we do not have your listed name in our system, however, we would like to hear from you to understand your situation more fully.

We have a high standard for the cleanliness of our apartment units. The units must be cleaned according to the move-out procedures on our website. ( https://ugroupcu.com/move-in-move-out/ ) These procedures are the same steps that we go through to make sure the apartment is clean enough for a new renter or it must be cleaned.

However, we want to understand your individual situation to see how we can improve in the future.
Could you email us about this?
You can email us at: Account.Inquiries@UGroupCU.com
-The University Group Team

name: University Group
review_text:
Be prepared for losing all of your deposits if you gonna live here. They gonna charge you a  ridiculous amount of money if you don't clean your room to 'brand new' (flawless) condition after checking out.

I wish Google allow us for rating 0 star, cuz this management team doesn't worth a single star.

Wow, so many bot 5 stars here.

name: University Group
review_text: Easily one of the major players in the leasing sector in Urbana-Champaign. A large selection of apartments at convenient locations. Resonable rates and prompt maintenance. However, the only negative is that they will overcharge (ridiculously) you for 'cleaning' at the end of your lease. So don't expect you security back,  infact you might end up paying extra instead.
owner_answer:
Angshuman, we are glad you have enjoyed our accommodations but saddened to hear about the cleaning issue. We would love a chance to make this right. Please email us at Leasing@UGroupCU.com or call (217) 352-3182. We hope to hear from you soon regarding this.
-The University Group Team

name: University Group
review_text: Super fast maintenance! I had an issue with the sink and they fixed it within the same day! My standards are low as a college student, but despite that, I know these guys still did a good job.
owner_answer:
Morgan, awesome! We certainly do our best to resolve any issues in a timely manner. We're enthused when we are able to complete them the same day! Follow us on social media! @UniversityGroupCU
-The University Group Team

name: University Group
review_text: HORROR STORY living here. Management takes too long to fix anything. Would not answer emergency maintenance calls for a furnace out in the dead of winter. Will show your apartment at absolutely anytime (no notice at all ever before showings), will insist to show your room to strangers even if you have told them it is a bad time, there is a mess etc. Disgustingly dirty when we moved in even though it was promised several times the apartment would be cleaned. Must contact them several times to get anything done. I would never live in one of their properties again.

name: University Group
review_text: Handled move in extremely poorly. Was supposed to have fiber internet fully installed and operational prior to move in. One week before the lease started we were informed it would be six additional weeks before we had any internet. They clearly knew before then and refused to reimburse costs when we had to scramble to find internet solutions.
owner_answer:
Aaron, we are so sorry about the inconveniences you have experienced with the fiber internet installation. Our local fiber internet supplier is completely backed up right now. Covid-19 has wreaked so much havoc on small businesses. We were happy to offer you rent credit to cover your internet expenses to say that we are so sorry for the inconveniences you've experienced. We will keep you informed as we have more updates in regards to the fiber internet installation.
If there is anything else that we can do please email us at Leasing@UGroupCU.com or call (217) 352-3182. Once again, we are so sorry about these inconveniences, Aaron.
-The University Group Team

name: University Group
review_text: A bankable leasing agency with well-maintained properties which have good quality interiors and facilities. The latest renovations have made this even better. They are always prompt in addressing our concerns and fixing issues to our satisfaction.

name: University Group
review_text: Using covid-19 as an excuse to treat tenants terribly. 1st I was not able to move in one time. Now, you guys are refusing to give a rent adjustment for BREAKING my lease. This will not work on me. I moved in and there was blood on my ceiling 8-23-21 and missing furniture(I have photo proof). I also filled an inspection report. I have been more than patient and nice. That has went out of the window as of today. Every person has struggled with covid-19. Do you see me breaking legal documents because of it? Do you see me taking advantage of college students? “Go ahead and talk to student legal services”. I did weeks ago and was instructed to ask for a rent credit instead of litigation. Guess ugroup response is litigation. If Covid-19 is the problem then you should have written a different lease. Covid has impacted all people so that is a very poor excuse for treating tenants like trash. I’m in college on a scholarship because my dad is a disabled veteran. WE ARE NOT NADE OUT OF CASH. Which is why I paid a slightly higher rate for furniture instead of spending an extra few thousand dollars.
owner_answer:
Kailey, thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback. We are so sorry that you’ve experienced these inconveniences during your time with us. We can certainly understand how this must have been frustrating.

We were happy to see that you received the rent credit that we offered due to the inconveniences. We did send you an offer allowing you to get out of your lease. We want to make sure you received that.
Did you receive that offer?
We would be happy to resend the offer to you.

Once again, we are so sorry for the furniture delays.
Our furniture providers have been extremely backordered due to COVID-19 which is, unfortunately, out of our control.

We contacted the furniture supplier again today to see if they have any updates.
You will be the first to know when we have an update.

We would love to speak with you further about this to see how we might improve.
Please email us at Leasing@UGroupCU.com.
We look forward to hearing from you, Kailey.
-The University Group Team

name: University Group
review_text: The staff is not friendly at all. They have very bad attitude. They were really good before signing the lease as soon as you sign the lease they change by 90 degree. Every person deserves Respect. You’ll never get your security deposit back..only good people they have, maintenance people.  All other are very rude people
owner_answer:
Hello, we're sorry to hear this from you. We would love a chance to make this right. Please get in touch with us by emailing Leasing@UGroupCU.com, calling 217-352-1472, or visiting our office at 309 S 1st St in Champaign. We look forward to hearing from you regarding this.
-The University Group Team

name: University Group
review_text: Working with Ugroup has been a lot easier than dealing with JSM. The maintenance team, in particular, was the best. They always respond very quickly while being understanding and kind. The ugroup staff was always honest and didn't try to scam the tenants in every way like jsm.

name: University Group
review_text: Do not live with University Group if you can help it. They love to charge you any which way, maintenance is never timely, you have to continuously call to have something fixed. They took out a huge chunk of my security deposit for painting the walls of my old apartment over the summer, which makes no sense. They should be charging me for damages that I inflicted, not for routine tidy ups they want to be doing. Move in date is very inconvenient, although I know that's something consistent with most leasing groups on campus. I had friends whose kitchen was supposed to be done getting remodeled over the summer, but when they moved in it still wasn't finished and was super inconvenient to work/cook around for a while. I don't know if University Group is just that bad, or if they literally just own too many properties to be able to handle everything well in a timely, friendly way. Either way, they're just not accountable.

name: University Group
review_text: Fast and quick response of maintanence, i had problem with my sink and the food waste disposal. They came the day after i reuqested a maintainence, also asked them to move a bed headboard out of the apartment since its really big and heavy. They did all the same day, im very satisfied with their efficiency.

name: University Group
review_text: University Group has been nothing but amazing! The maintenance team was kind and got everything done in a timely manor. The girls up front are so helpful and friendly! I can’t say enough good things about this company!

name: University Group
review_text: Loud construction directly adjacent to occupied units and Covid violations throughout the term of our lease. Does not warn tenants about random cuts to utility apart from one instance where our water was stopped for over 8 hours during the day. Refused to heed any complaints. We would not have signed if we knew about the construction. Also heard from a previous tenant that University Group kept over half their deposit for "cleaning" when I know for a fact that unit is currently under construction.
owner_answer:
Hello, we are sorry to hear about the construction disturbances.
We completely understand. We did send you an offer to leave your lease due to the disturbances.
Did you receive that offer?
If you didn’t receive our offer or if you’d like to talk more please don’t hesitate to get in touch. You can email us at Leasing@UGroupCU.com, call (217) 352-3182, or come see us in the office at 309 S 1st St. We look forward to hearing from you regarding this.
-The University Group Team

name: University Group
review_text: I have had a great experience so far. The maintenance technicians have been great! Very responsive to our requests and fixed everything. The realator has also been very polite and responsive and communicates well :)

name: University Group
review_text: I happen to be at my apartment when the maintenance staff came over and I want to say that they responded fast to my request, they are very professional and extremely helpful.

name: University Group
review_text:
There are roaches all over the room, if you would like a roach inside your mouth when you wake up, come live there!

They are still lying about the time when they discovered the roaches issue, they have already known when the last resident broke the lease because of pre-existing roaches on August 2021.

They leased it to me, very much aware of the roaches, but didn’t say a word.

Just as everyone reading this review know, 506 E Stoughton is still full of roaches, they never ever resolved the issue, just like other Ugroup apartments like 311 E White etc.
owner_answer:
Sherry, we are very sorry that you experience a pest issue.
We have a very high standard for the cleanliness of our apartment units.
Our records indicate that you vacated your apartment with us on December 31, 2021.
We quickly scheduled a pest treatment one we became aware of the issue in November of 2021.
The treatment was completed at your apartment in November of 2021 and the issue has been resolved ever since.
If there is anything further that we can do, please reach out to us at Leasing@UGroupCU.com
-The University Group Team

name: University Group
review_text: The maintenance staff have always been prompt, considerate, and helpful in resolving the handful of problems that have arisen over the past several year, most recently a few days ago when I simply needed some help installing a window air-conditioner.

name: University Group
review_text: Had one of the most excellent service experiences. A repair man came in to change door lock on the request of the agency. He was incredibly friendly and cheerful. He went beyond his call of duty, helping me with other minor repairs. Great guy, great work, totally made my day!

name: University Group
review_text: Had a fantastic experience with maintenance. My maintenance worker was Cameron and he did an absolutely fantastic job. Got everything fixed within 15 minutes and was extremely nice and knowledgeable.

name: University Group
review_text: Maintenance is always quick and great at what they do. Rent is the best on campus. Apartments could use some refurbishing but they're still fantastic, unique living spaces. Cory and his crew can fix anything

name: University Group
review_text: I used CPM last year and had an awful experience with them in general, but that made me even more grateful for how great university group has been. My roommates and I are so far impressed with how responsive, effective, quick and kind their maintenance staff is.

name: University Group
review_text: Most terrible manager ever. When I move out, we have cleaned everything. But they still charge me $350 for cleaning with no explanation of why. Believe me, don't live there.  They recently purchased a lot of apartments around the campus. They first thing they do is increase the price universally.

name: University Group
review_text:
Can't say they're the worst, but they only returned $2 of the deposit and the place was in better condition than it came in.  The damage report when moving in was completely filled out with all of the things that was wrong, but they took it out of the deposit to fix it up.

When you graduate and move a few states away, they think you'll just roll over when they stick it to you because you'd have to go back to Champaign and sue them to get your deposit.

Update:  After calling them and waiting for a manager to call me back, he agreed that we should not be charged for the painting and that the place was actually clean when we left...so he'd give us half of the cleaning charges back.

name: University Group
review_text: I worked with Nick Hiles, and it was a pleasure.  He went the extra mile for me working with me on an unorthodox room arrangement.  Great flexibility, and he worked with the owners on my behalf.  I am excited about my new apartment.  This review is specific to my experience of Nick's service and I will post another review after I have lived in the apartment for a sufficient amount of time to formulate a review for the apartment and University Group as a whole.

name: University Group
review_text: The leasing agent promised us early move in on August 5. Today on July 31 we just discovered that we aren’t able to move in to August 23 and that the leasing agent completely lied to us. Apparently there was a list that we had to sign up on to be able to early move in. The leasing agent made absolutely no mention of this list and now we have to figure out where to live for the next 23 days

name: University Group
review_text: DONT EVER EVER EVER lease from this management! In the beginning they will beg you to sign the contract as they claim only a small fraction of "carpet cleaning fee" will be charged based on the condition at move out. GUESS WHAT? no matter how clean you had done with the apartment, they will charge you that carpet fee!!!! EVEN if your apartment is WOOD FLOOR! Yet they also charge this ridiculous painting fee that is never mentioned in the contract. Besides, rude front desk guy yells at you when you demand a nice conversation with the higher level management. That's right, see you in small claim court.

name: University Group
review_text: I signed a lease with them for the first time last year. The management was super helpful very fast at responding to any concerns or fixing any maintenance issues. I moved into the apartment with a bad impression bc of the negative comments, but none of that was true in my experience.

name: University Group
review_text: Do not live in University Group apartment. When you move out your apartment, they will find any reasons to deduct your deposit. Just be careful if you are living in University Group. New students, try to find another property management. I have been charged with $600 for carpet cleaning and painting fees. This is ridiculous.
owner_answer:
Jason, it hurts to hear you say this. We'd like to talk with you more about this. Please get in touch with us by emailing Leasing@UGroupCU.com, calling (217) 352-3182, or visiting our office at 309 S 1st St in Champaign. We're sorry to hear about your negative experience with us but we look forward to hearing from you.
-The University Group Team

name: University Group
review_text:
Like others have already said, they are the worst choice to take lease from on campus. Firstly they are not welcoming at all. I just went to their office to ask some information about showing time and it seemed like I am giving them extra pain just by asking the times. They could easily print that paper which had the list of apartments with time, which could make things easier for both of us. But they were not helping at all.
Since they are the one giving service to us, they should be more courteous towards their customers...

name: University Group
review_text:
Like most people said, maintenance is great.
On the other hand, I lived with University Group for 2 years, and each time I moved out, they tried to screw me over on the security deposit.

name: University Group
review_text: I have been renting with University Group for over 3 years now. The building was in excellent shape when I moved in and has therefore not had many maintenance requests, but all the requests they've done have been of excellent quality!

name: University Group
review_text: thanks for taking my money, university group. this company will charge you ridiculous amount of money for different kinds of cleanings - which is UNREASONABLE and odd because the apartment was still very dirty? (i doubt that they acutally cleaned it because the aparment was not clean at all, maybe dirtier) the company promised to provide us with new refurbished furiniture in the beginning of the year but they never responded back. i will never go back, yay!

name: University Group
review_text: I had a great call with Benjamin who helped me through the issues I was having at my apartment. And he was really helpful. Not everything is perfect but they care about customers.
owner_answer:
Alhasan, thank you for taking time to leave a review.
Could you tell us more specifically what went wrong?
We don't have record of any issues on your account.
We are sorry that you feel this way and would love to make it right.
Could you reach out to us about this?
Please email us at Leasing@UGroupCU.com
We wish you all the best!
-The University Group Team

name: University Group
review_text: After staying at a University Group property for over 2 years, I can wholeheartedly recommend them. Having a realtor that has many properties and a decent amount of resources really makes a difference in a small town like Urbana-Champaign. We have been temporarily moved to a new location due to major leakage, have received a new washing machine in a day's time that too on a weekend when it was -15 and Icy conditions outside, and have contested our security deposit after 8 months of leaving the property, only to see a prompt action and a check in the mailbox within 5 days.

name: University Group
review_text: The maintenance of University Group is pretty great. Each time I requested a maintenance, they come so quickly and make everything work fine with patience and profession.

name: University Group
review_text: Zero recommendation! Very rude and unfriendly, they want to charge all your deposit. Even though you send them the pictures about the damage when you moved in, and in the end they said you need to give them the physical picture instead of by email, and they gonna still charge for the deposit. Also, there are bugs and ants in there property, and they never solve the problem.

name: University Group
review_text: The maintenance team is AMAZING 🤩. They never take long to fix your request and are always so nice in their emails. I put in like 5 request and they all got fixed in less than a week.

name: University Group
review_text:
This company makes up FAKE CHARGES to charge students extra money.

Charged me a huge amount for carpet cleaning When I Didnt Even Have A Carpet! They refuse to cooperate and will send Fake Bills to Collections. students are just another money making scheme for University Group.

Not worth it to stay here.
owner_answer:
Nalin, thank you for taking the time to leave us some feedback.
On rare occasions, our system charges incorrectly. If you do not have carpet then you will receive a refund for that charge. Please email us at the email below if you do not receive that in the coming weeks.

As for any other charges, we have a high standard for the cleanliness of our apartment units. The units must be cleaned according to the move-out procedures on our website: https://ugroupcu.com/move-in-move-out/
These procedures are the same steps that we go through to make sure the apartment is clean enough for a new renter or it must be professionally cleaned before the next tenant moves in.

Please let us know if you do not receive your carpet cleaning refund!
You can email us at Account.Inquiries@UGroupCU.com.
-The University Group Team

name: University Group
review_text: I think their service is great. They will change the bed and fix the faucet as I report. The maintenance people are very nice. They are busy when the new term starts. But they have really good service.

name: University Group
review_text: Great team work! Very convenient online service and kind staff. The maintenance team works very fast. It comes to help on the next day after your request (for us it is the most important thing).

name: University Group
review_text: The maintenance request we asked for about the kitchen light switch and the fan in the living room have been properly dealt with. The experience with maintenance staff Cameron was great.

name: University Group
review_text: My roommates and I haven't had any poor experiences with UGroup. They're always prompt with maintenance requests and go out of their way to help their tenants out.

name: University Group
review_text: The Worst management in town. I singed a lease with their brand new building. But after we were moving in. The building does not have internet service. Xfinity said the building does not even have internet construction. However, this management want us as tenants to deal with this issue. They just said there is nothing they can be. I contacted with Xfinity yesterday and they said I should contact the management in order to push the ticket. This management is just taking your money away without solving problems. You are right, they are just close to scammers.

name: University Group
review_text: The maintenance team responds quickly and comes in to resolve any issues the next day. I have had a positive experience living in University Group housing so far.

name: University Group
review_text:
I do not recommend this company to anyone. They made hard enquiry checks on my credit score three times! These are mature adults who should know how enquiries made on a credit score affects a person's credit, but they went ahead anyway. The first time was when I about to sign a lease, which was okay, but they went ahead to check twice even while still a tenant just because I wanted to view two different apartments. Shouldn't the company have a way of checking who is already in the system and avoid the enquiry? Should they even check a credit score for just a viewing? This doesn't make any sense and I'm still very upset at this because it shows how unprofessional and incompetent these people are. I am definitely never going to live here or recommend anyone else to university group.
FYI: I am a student with a pretty low credit score because of this incompetence.

name: University Group
review_text: We got 35% of our initial security deposit back for the most random things. Additionally, at the very beginning of the year when our lease provider changed, UGroup tried to scam our entire apartment by adding a random fee to our internet (which totaled to over $3000 for a shared 1 Gigabit internet connection throughout the entire apartment). They also tried to raise the rent by saying that they "combined the sanitation fee" with the rent (instead of paying for it all at the beginning) and they also tried to add a sanitation fee in the beginning. They basically tried to double dip the sanitation fee. When I confronted Ugroup about this through email, they said "oops" and dropped the extra charges. Avoid UGroup if possible. There are better providers on campus i.e. Advantage Properties

name: University Group
review_text: Great Staff. Very professional leasing agents. And the management is the best I’ve ever seen. If your looking for housing look no further. University Group is the best.

name: University Group
review_text: The maintenance team is responsible and efficient. They response to our maintained requests and fix the problems rapidly every time.
owner_answer:
Ruoyu, thank you for leaving a review.

We are so glad that you have enjoyed our maintenance service. Please let us know if there is anything else that we can do to help.

Follow us on social media: @UniversityGroupCU

-The University Group Team

name: University Group
review_text: I sent a message through the portal to have my balcony door fixed and it was fixed within a couple of days!  Maintenance did a great job and worked quickly!
owner_answer:
Angie, thank you for taking the time to leave a review.
We are so glad you enjoyed our speedy maintenance service!
We certainly aim to please.
Feel free to follow us on social media! @UniversityGroupCU
-The University Group Team

name: University Group
review_text: Asked for door squeaking issue. Handled the day I sent a request! Awesome work. They sent out an email that says since they have some down time and they want to handle any issues. So I sent a request and they handled it right away. perfect

name: University Group
review_text: I've been living here for just a week now, but so far they have been the best! Always with good disposition to help with every little detail that has popped out in my apartment (some of them were really small issues, but got fixed with the same dedication as it were a huge problem)

name: University Group
review_text: This group is horrible. DO NOT stay here! I've been living in apartments in Urbana-Champaign for over 5 years and have not seen any group that violates personal space and privacy like the University Group does! They would just enter your apartment with permission. The staff in the front desk and the maintenance team is super racist. Horrible customer service. Please don't stay here. I will probably terminate my lease early because I can't stand this place any more.

name: University Group
review_text: Cory Busboom is a wonderful maintenance tech! I've been bothering him with several req. to fix minor things at the 609 main apt, but he's been reliable, knowledgeable, and very friendly. I highly recommend!

name: University Group
review_text: Love the fully remodeled units. They are top notch. The management team has been great to work with.

name: University Group
review_text:
Cool people. A welcoming environment. They give you time to fill out a unit condition form. Thy helped me settle a dispute with a roomate.
I still hate my roomate but I enjoyed the apartment.
Make sure the security deposit is in your name.

name: University Group
review_text: The maintenance staff always does a great job, we put in requests and they usually completed them the same day a few hours later. Timely and nice to work with.

name: University Group
review_text: They completely siphon off your deposit and on top of that overcharge you for unnecessary services and remodeling of the house while moving out. Worst experience in the ending. Strongly not recommended.
owner_answer:
Akash, we are so sorry to hear about this. We would love a chance to discuss this with you. Please get in touch with us by emailing Leasing@UGroupCU.com, calling 217-352-1472, or visiting our office at 309 S 1st St in Champaign. We look forward to hearing from you regarding this.
-The University Group Team

name: University Group
review_text: Cory and the maintenance crew are awesome! Needed their help twice in a week, and they solved the issues within a day. Thank you and keep up the good work!

name: University Group
review_text: I did not receive my entire security deposit back, and part of the fee was a carpet cleaning fee in a unit that is not carpeted. I emailed a complaint multiple times and was told this fee was in the lease, and then stopped receiving replies all together.

name: University Group
review_text: The requested maintenance work was done very fast and the technician was very polite and professional.
owner_answer: Thachakrit, it makes us happy that you enjoyed our speedy, professional maintenance service. We appreciate you leaving a review to tell us about this! Please follow us on social media! @UniversityGroupCU Have a great day! -The University Group Team

name: University Group
review_text: Just the worst. One working dryer for entire building. Put in countless maintenance requests and never fixed. Extensive, noisy construction work with no warning. Hidden charges in rent. Multiple lost checks. Terrible.
owner_answer:
Hello David

I am very sorry to hear about your frustrations! Thank you very much for sharing - we are always working to improve our business via resident feedback. Please call me at 217-352-3182 and I will be more then happy to work with you on the individual issues.

Thank you!
Steve G.

name: University Group
review_text: I've had terrible experience with them when dealing with bed bugs in my apartment. They kept telling me to contact pest control myself and won't waive part of my rent when I vacate. I had to pay almost 100 dollars to buy stuff to fight bed bugs in their property.
owner_answer:
Lin, we're so sorry to hear this. We would love a chance to make this right. Please get in touch with us by emailing Leasing@UGroupCU.com, calling (217) 352-3182, or visiting our office at 309 S 1st St in Champaign. We look forward to hearing from you.
-The University Group Team

name: University Group
review_text: The maintenance team is great. They are very professional and response to every emergency request quickly. Best maintenance team I've met.

name: University Group
review_text: Visited them to check out an apartment and they had me fill out my SSN number and pulled a hard check on my credit report even before I viewed the apartment. (I was assured that there will not be a hard check). The apartment I viewed was pathetic and never went back. A hard pull on my credit report for nothing. DO NOT give your SSN until you decide to sign a lease!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: The Dean Campustown is filled with scams, horrible service, and much more. The Dean uses some type of bills company for electricity and usage, during the summer none of us were in the apartment and we were charged 170 dollars each for the month for electricity!!!! What is this how did they try to charge us this. Another scam they just did was the move out charges!!! They will charge you outrageous amounts for either leaving belongings or if it isn’t spotless when you move out. Yes I understand that there should be some penalties for leaving your belongings or a little dust collected from the month you weren’t there but this is crazy? 300+ dollars were charged to my account and all my 3 other roommates as well for these reasons!!!! In what world would it take to 1200 dollars to clean these things when it was already clean??? They shouldn’t be profiting from this this is outrageous. The service over the course of the year has been horrible too but I’m just glad I don’t have to deal with this anymore. As a student at the university of illinois the dean campustown might sound appealing but this is a place I highly encourage you stay far away from.
owner_answer: Ghazi, thank you for reaching out to us. We are always transparent with our policies and fees and are sorry to see that you are disappointed with your move-out charges. Please know that if you have any questions about your statement, you may contact us at info@thedeancampustown.com, and we will be happy to discuss your concerns in depth. We wish you well in your new home.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text:
Basically randomly charge you for anything. Especially when you move out. For in return, they would also disregard your requests like unlock the window for you.

And finally, you can enjoy one of the most expensive apartments in Champaign at the dean.

Enjoy it!
owner_answer: Huma, thank you for reaching out to us. We aim for total transparency regarding our policies and pricing and are sorry to see you feel otherwise. When you have a moment, please email us at info@thedeancampustown.com so we can answer any questions about your lease agreement and resolve any lingering maintenance concerns. We look forward to connecting.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: Do not sign here. The cost is insane for a place where they don’t care about the residents at all. Staff is typically just mad every day, package room is unorganized and was actually raided over the summer where people’s packages were torn open and stolen. Apartment was received with multiple things broken and messed up and when moving out we were charged hundreds of dollars for those things that were not because of us. Horrible place to live, please do not stay here.
owner_answer: Jordan, thank you for sharing your concerns. We are committed to providing exceptional service and competitive pricing, and we regret that you feel dissatisfied. Our team is always upfront about our move-out fees and policies, and we welcome the opportunity to discuss your charges in greater detail. At your convenience, please reach out to us at info@thedeancampustown.com.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: Beware of this complex. The location is great, but if you have any issues- like plumbing leaking or the garage door not opening, even when you pay extra for parking, these issues will never get fixed, no matter how many times you call them. I would recommend not renting here.
owner_answer: Leigh Ann, thank you for sharing how much you enjoy our convenient location. We strive to provide comfortable, functional homes, and we are sorry to hear that your maintenance needs were not resolved to your satisfaction. We would like the opportunity to address any lingering concerns and invite you to email us at info@thedeancampustown.com so we may assist you.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: I liked living at the Dean. Granted I didn't have a view because I wasn't told my room wouldn't have a window, but it was still a nice cozy stay away from home. The amenities at the Dean are great! I loved everything about the study lounge and the gym was pretty nice. I would say the best feature about the whole place is the complimentary hot chocolate and the luxor package system. Oh and the views from the penthouse were excellent for those long summer days.
owner_answer: Yasmin, we want our residents to feel at home in our community so we loved reading your comments! Thank you for sharing your favorite things about living here!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: I am currently living at the dean and I love it!! I used the amenities all the time. My personal favorite is the study lounge. But, the best thing about the dean is how close it is to campus. It's only a 5-10 min walk to all my classes. Overall, the Dean is made my college experience way better!
owner_answer: Hi Advik, we are pleased to hear that you are enjoying your experience in our community thus far and appreciate your recognition of our study lounge and prime location. Thank you for sharing your terrific review.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: I currently live at the Dean, and my favorite thing about it is the location on campus. It’s super close to all my classes, and within walking distance of 90% of the places I go. The proximity to Target is very convenient for a grocery trip after class, and anything else you might need. The amenities have got to be my second favorite thing about the Dean. The study room is really nice, and it’s very convenient since I can head up to my apartment if I need anything in the middle of my study session. The gym and separate yoga room is also really useful. One of the biggest downsides of the Dean is that the in-unit washer-dryer is located directly in the kitchen and living area, and the washer is VERY loud, so I try to be in my room when someone’s doing laundry. Also, if you have a car, beware of the insanely tight turns when entering the parking garage. It’s very easy to scrape the side of your car since it’s very narrow. Other than that, the experience at the Dean has been very pleasant, and the biggest reason I would pick the Dean is the location.
owner_answer: Devanshi, thank you for sharing all the things you love about our community! We hope you'll continue to enjoy our amazing amenities and convenient location for a long time to come.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: I actually signed with The Dean a year ago, but had to relet the apartment due to unexpected circumstances. They were extremely helpful in finding a sublease and streamlining the process where it wasn’t as stressful as I had thought! I also love the amenities and found the staff extremely amicable!
owner_answer: Hello Ruchi, thank you for your interest in our community. Our team likes to go the extra mile for our residents, and we are glad your experience with our team has reflected this. We hope to have you in our community soon.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: After touring the Dean this past fall I immediately knew I wanted to live here! The staff is so kind and welcoming. In addition to how beautiful the apartments are, the community in the building is just as amazing.
owner_answer: Madison, thank you for choosing us! We work hard to provide the best living experience for our residents and are delighted that you love it here. Thank you for giving us five stars!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text:
The Dean Campustown is the best place to live when you go to UIUC. The location and the price is absolutely perfect not to far from campus and not to far from restaurants and bars. The staff is extremely nice and very easy to talk to if you need help or any information same with the maintenance staff. If you need to sign a lease for the upcoming semesters I would do it quickly because they go fast. P.S. (I want the PS5😂)

Happy New Year!!!
owner_answer: We truly appreciate your wonderful review, Jack! We care about our residents and work hard to provide a wonderful living experience for them. Thank you for your kind words about our team!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text:
Have lived here for more than one year and a half. Overall i am satisfied with them. But there are a few issues. the quality of the appliance is very poor, i live in a s1 studio for a whole year and the AC broke down like 8 times. Some friends also have dryer broken, the maintainence come in 2-3 days but sometimes they cannot solve the problem. imagine living without heat in Illinois's cold winter which is horrible. One of the front desk staff is unfriendly but I believe she was removed by the manager.
Also the price goes up dramatically after i move out. The small m1 studio was 1199 and with discount when I live in but know it's 1699...the 1b is 2000 which is amazingly a Chicago downtown style....cannot believe anyone spent over 1200 a month living in this remote university town, that's unbelievable. Maybe international students are so rich ahh. It's totally not worth it for that high price.
owner_answer: Douglas, thank you for your review. Our team works hard to address the needs of our residents, and we apologize if your maintenance concerns have not been resolved to your satisfaction. We would like to connect with you to discuss your concerns in greater detail and address any pending maintenance requests. When you have a moment, please contact us at info@thedeancampustown.com.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: The Dean is such an incredible place to live! Beautiful amenities, very helpful staff, and a really nice view. Certain areas can get crowded at times, but that proves how popular the building is.
owner_answer: Jasmine, knowing that you think our community is incredible truly brightens our day! Thank you for giving us five stars!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: I love all the amenities available while living at The Dean! My favorite thing to take advantage of is the study room. The staff is wonderful and the rooms are very nice :)
owner_answer: Hi Amber, we are glad to hear that you benefitted from the use of our dedicated study room and are grateful for your recognition of our professional service. Thank you for your great review!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: Haven't lived there yet, but from the tour I took, I was very impressed! Clean building, great amenities, staff was not only super welcoming, but also honest which I really appreciated! Super excited to live there next year!
owner_answer: Regina, we pride ourselves in providing a comfortable, enjoyable living experience for our residents and are delighted to hear that you loved your tour! Thank you for leaving a positive review. We look forward to having you join our community!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text:
Update on Nov 29:
They said they sent the check, but after 20 days, I still didn't receive it. So I asked if they can send another check, they said they will check with the accounting department if they can do so. Then 12 days passed, I sent three follow-ups, but no one replied. Really frustrating. Their response rate is roughly 50%, and wait time is on average more than 4 days. I remember they were much more efficient when they respond to inquiries on leasing apartments. It has been more than two months and the issue is still not resolved.

Original review:
Lived there last year. It's been two months since my move-out and I haven't received my deposit refund check. Contacted them three times through email but no one responded.
owner_answer: Bing-Yuan, thank you for contacting us. We know the importance of responsive communication and apologize if there have been any misunderstandings regarding your deposit. Unfortunately, when we requested the refund to be reissued a while back, there were some issues with the mailing service. We have requested for it to be overnighted. At your earliest convenience, please email us at info@thedeancampustown.com and mention this review in the subject line. We look forward to assisting you with any further questions or concerns.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: The dean is a great place to live and study! I’m someone who’s easily distracted in my apartment but being able to have a built in study room made my late night studying sessions way more productive and accessible, and the rooftop is amazing during the warm months it’s such a nice break after a long day of class.
owner_answer: Safa, we appreciate it when our residents let us know what they love about living here! It makes us happy to hear that the study room was so helpful. Thank you for sharing your experience!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text:
The place has sewage problems. The wifi in half building does not work. The management is horrible and the leasing manager is extremely rude. Do not sign here, they just care about taking your money. The rooms are not proportionate. I have been without wifi for a month and a half. The hot tub is never clean. And rarely works.
Good luck.
owner_answer: Anna, thank you for your review. Please know that we value our residents and want to do our best to make their living experience enjoyable. We regret that you have felt dissatisfied with the Wi-Fi connectivity. Our team is committed to courteous and professional service, so we would like to learn more about your experience. We encourage you to please contact our office at your earliest convenience. Thank you.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: It’s my second year living in the Dean, and everything is good for me. The maintenance  is fast and reliable, the room is comfortable, and all the staffs are nice. I think it’s worthy to live here.
owner_answer: Chris, thank you for choosing to make this community your home for another year! We truly appreciate your kind words about our team and look forward to serving you many more times in the future.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: Honestly, I didn’t know what to expect when my homegirl showed me this place, but I’ve gotta say, I’ve loved it! And Cedric was AMAZING. Best tour ever! No notes!!
owner_answer: Your kind words about Cedric mean so much to us, Riki! Thank you for sharing your experience!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: My son lived in The Dean Campustown for the 2021-2022 school year.  Looks pretty, spaces are aesthetically pleasing but the management is a 0!  My son left his apartment in late may.  He left sone belongings in his apartment because he wanted to come back in July to live and start moving things into his new apartment.  We leased from June 2021 through July 31, 2022.  Upon returning to his apartment which he was still leasing in mid July, the apartment had completely been emptied, cleaned spotless, and the air conditioning cranked and the windows left side open so we could cool down all of Champaign.  Contacted immediately manager Cedric Jones and he denied anyone being in there, or cleaning it.  Took zero responsibility for the theft of my sons belongings! He said he would look at security cameras and figure this out but he never did, avoids all my calls and is blatantly ignoring me!  He will not take any responsibility for possibly cleaning wrong unit.  Do not rent here!! Very dishonest staff and management.  What if my son was still in this room when they came in.  Breaking and entering and theft is not ok!!  ....because we were still leasing until July 31st!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: After a semester, I’ve had a good time at this apartment. The campus facilities are good and the response time for maintenance is decent as well. All in all it is a good place to live!
owner_answer: Amrith, we love hearing that our residents enjoy their time in our community! Thank you for sharing your thoughts!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text:
Wifi outage during the week students either have finals or are preparing for finals is ridiculous. This is about the 5th or 6th internet outage/blackout I have had since moving here in August.

Internet outages seem to be so frequent at The Dean you are better off purchasing a premium personal hotspot plan for your phone.
owner_answer: Sepehr, we strive to provide the best possible living experience for our residents and are sorry to hear that you have been displeased with the Wifi situation. When you have a moment, please call or stop by our office so that we can discuss your experience in greater detail and address your concerns. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: 10/10 would recommend! I have truly enjoyed living here for the past few years. The amenities are awesome, cool staff and spacious modern apartments.
owner_answer: We appreciate you for taking the time to share your excellent remarks. We are so pleased to hear how much you enjoy our top-notch amenities, excellent team, and modern homes. Your glowing recommendation means so much to us!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: I applied for The Dean in the fall of 2021. At the beginning, I discussed with the manager of The Dean together with my roommate that we can move in after June, and the staff ensured that we can move in early during the tour. However, after we signed the lease and right before the early move-in date, they notified us that we cannot move in until the new semester. Then we sent an email to manager discuss this issue and there was no response. Later, I heard from other residents of The Dean that the manager's handling methods were not good every time, and never care about any problems of the residents, which made the residents experience extremely poor. Not allowing us to move in early this time also seriously affected our plan. I regretted it as soon as I signed the lease. I do not recommend anyone considering living in The Dean to sign this apartment.
owner_answer:
Hi Zhuorui,

Hi Zhuorui Li, we appreciate your honest review. We set a high standard for ourselves, so we are disappointed to hear that your experience with us was not a positive one. The Dean Campustown has updated our staff and continue to grow to improve our quality customer service.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: The fact that the staff is so welcoming and friendly is a plus!! I enjoyed touring the complex and the staff are super chill! This whole experience alone has me convinced to move here.
owner_answer: Cristy, we take pride in providing friendly service and truly appreciate your praise! We appreciate your interest in our community and hope to hear from you soon!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: I just moved into The Dean and love it here. The front office staff has been so nice and helpful. The move in process was so quick and fast! The rooftop views of campus are priceless! I don’t understand these negative reviews on here. The Dean management and staff has been nothing but nice. Love it here and plan on living here until I graduate.
owner_answer: Matney Portillo, thank you for your kind words and this wonderful review! If you're ever in need of more help, please let us know!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: I moved into The Dean in August right when it finished construction, and it has been by far the best living situation I have had in college. The amenities are world class!! Even with the city of Champaign restricting all amenities at all properties, the staff has made sure they are kept in pristine condition. Now that amenities are able to be open again, it has been amazing using the rooftop deck and pool! The staff are also always helpful and available when I have had any questions. The units are brand new and the views are of campus/campustown are extraordinary. I also love having a Target on the ground level, it is extremely convenient to get almost anything I would need. The Dean has been a major upgrade for my housing!!
owner_answer:
Hi Ryan,

Ryan Carlson, your satisfaction is our top priority. The Dean Campustown values your review!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: I personally have no complaints of my stay here. overall, i was well accommodated, and maintenance was always quick with requests. Never had issues with appliances, hot water etc. Management is quick to getting back to you, and answering any questions!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: At first it seems worth it to live here, until you realize how many inconveniences exist. First off, the parking garage is stupidly designed - they must have met the legal minimum size to be able to allow cars to enter - the side of every other car in the garage is scraped due to their stupid design! Second of all, the management is TERRIBLE. Among the worst I have seen in Champaign. When asking the management about certain things, you are often be met with the answer "There's nothing I can do" or "Let me write down your name" - and absolutely NOTHING is done in regards to your issue. Second of all, the wifi is terrible. I have a friend who had a remote proctored exam today and was FAILED because the wifi went down mid-test and remained down for the remainder of the day. Now he has to go through the process of appealing his test grade and there's a chance his graduation schedule may be hindered! When he called the building to ask if the wifi could be fixed earlier in the day he was met with the answer "There's nothing I can do". Not to mention the fact that they drastically spike up their rent prices every year so renewing isn't feasible, the elevators often take too long to come, and the building just manages to "lose" your packages. When asking the front desk staff what happened to your package they will often times simply say "contact the seller and have them send you another one". Absolutely terrible building, garbage management, and if I had to make one recommendation, it would be live at The Hub instead.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: I think the building is beautiful and the amenities are great! However the heater for the pool has been broken since we’ve moved in and hasn’t been fixed even though they said they’ve already ordered the piece.
owner_answer: Layla, we appreciate your kind words about our community. We understand your concerns about the pool and apologize for any inconvenience you have experienced. If you would like additional information about the situation and our efforts to resolve it, please reach out to us at info@thedeancampustown.com.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: I really like The Dean! I already renewed my lease for next year. It’s a great location and the staff is wonderful!
owner_answer: Allison, we are thrilled to hear that you renewed your lease! Thank you for your kind words about our team and for giving us a positive review!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: I love the staff at the Dean! They’re always planning fun activities and playing games with residents! I also love following their social media, u never know which contests u might end up entering…
owner_answer:
Hi Kelvin,

The Dean Campustown is glad to hear about your great experience and how the staff has been helpful each step along the way.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: Living at the Dean has made my sophomore year much more bearable than my freshman year. A giant step above a tiny dorm. The internet is fast and my apartment is comfortable.
owner_answer: Nicolas, we are thrilled to hear that you are enjoying spending your sophomore year as a resident of our community. Thank you for taking the time to share your fantastic review with us!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: I am not disappointed with the Dean. I want to specifically thank Cheyenne for her amazing customer service! She is definitely knowledgeable of the property, answered all my questions without hesitation. Her energy made the experience very positive and me excited for the possibility of living here.
owner_answer: Stephie Here, we're happy you found our staff to be so supportive during your experience here at The Dean Campustown. Please don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything additional we can do for you!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: Love living here at the Dean. The staff is amazing and very helpful!  Move in day was great and the management had movers assist me move into my apartment. I also love using the fitness center. Great place to call home!
owner_answer: Hi Tom Washam, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at The Dean Campustown. We're happy we could meet your expectations! Please let us know if anything comes up that we can further assist with. Have a fantastic day!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: Truly a great place to live! From the location, amenities, to caring staff and fun resident events my experience while living at The Dean has always been enjoyable! Would definitely recommend this place!
owner_answer: Chyann Thomas, your wonderful feedback and rating mean a lot to us.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: If you look at all of the profiles of the 5-star reviews you will see that The Dean clearly paid for these fake reviews. I actually live here and can say that it is terrible. Firstly, one of our showers leak so badly it would flood our apartment if we actually turned it on. Beyond this there is constant internet outages for hours, many of the promised amenities have either been postponed indefinitely or outright ignored. The purchased fake reviews should say everything you need to know about this place. I'll update my review if they ever do get around to addressing the massive issues every tenant is experiencing but until then: Do. Not. Live. Here.
owner_answer: Garrett, thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We regret that you had a negative experience, and will use this as an opportunity to improve. If you are willing to give us another chance, please contact us at (217) 689-1111 so we can understand your situation better in order to try and turn your experience around.Thank you,The Dean Campustown

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: Great new building with nice amenities for a college student.  However, the staff there is not responsive at all, has very poor customer service and in general not very flexible with their customers.  In addition, be careful of the 4Br setup.  The rooms very in size for the same price per student.  Some also have very large windows with lots of light and others have a port hole more or less.  Ask to see room before signing the lease.
owner_answer: We appreciate all reviews, and appreciate you giving us the chance to improve by providing us with this feedback.  We are disappointed to hear that you did not have a more positive experience with us at The Dean Campustown. Please reach out to us at (217) 689-1111 so we may identify ways to improve your experience.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: The management team has always been amazing to work with from the moment I first moved into my apartment they have made my transition into a new state and new environment smooth and easy with their quick response and professionalism.
owner_answer: Hi, Scott, and thank you for letting us know about your wonderful experience. Our team strives to provide a high level of service and a comfortable living experience, and we are overjoyed to hear you feel the same. We appreciate your praise!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: New amenities and facilities? Count me in! Plus all the retail spaces around the area? Super happy we got to speak to Cheyenne about the property. She has a great personality and is super easy to talk to. One of the best tours we had out of the others.
owner_answer: We appreciate your positive review about your recent experience with us! We are always more than happy to assist you if anything else comes up. Take care!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: I love that my grandson lives here. When seeing the building at move in, I was impressed by its visual appeal, the security,  the amenities and how efficiently they operated move in. Garrett has been very helpful from the front desk. 10/10 customer service! Would 100% recommend having your kids/grandchildren live here.
owner_answer: Elizabeth Mcreynolds, thank you for your kind review; we are happy to pass along your comments to the team here at The Dean Campustown!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: stopped by the other day and was shocked with the attention to detail and cleanliness, down the basketball school decor throughout the building. great to see a building based on the campus community of students in common areas with music and study rooms. great customer service on my calls with Garrett. great vibes all around
owner_answer: Ethan Larson, we're glad to hear you enjoyed your visit. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you; we are more than happy to help!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: Terrible business model. They go after their tenants purposely giving fines because they are short of money, basically stealing money from the people already giving them money. The whole management is sketchy and I’ve confirmed this with an ex employee. Unless you are going to live at The Dean doing absolutely nothing, I would not recommend living here.
owner_answer:
Hi Bob,

The Dean Campustown would like to apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced during your stay. The Dean Campustown has updated our staff and hold each member to a high standard of customer service.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: I am very pleased with my visit to The Dean Campustown. The staff has been knowledgeable, very friendly and helpful with questions that I had about the apartments. The building is absolutely gorgeous and I can't wait to visit Target once it is opened.  I would definitely recommend Living at The Dean!
owner_answer: Hi Laura, we are very happy to have provided you with such a positive experience! We are looking forward to the opening of Target as well!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: I love the Dean. It is a beautiful, high-rise building. The staff is always around to help us and show great customer service. I'd like to thank Iqra for always taking care of us when we contact the building. Overall great experience :)
owner_answer: Hello Muazama Haider, we appreciate you taking the time to leave us this feedback. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you; we are more than happy to help!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text:
Edited: I think the staff is nice after talking to them in person, so I’m giving them more stars. The location and apartment sound isolation is great.

Original: The place is nice but, please, improve your staff training. Everytime I called and asked questions, I got different answers. If I talked to 3 different staffs, I got 3 different answers for a question. Like how?
owner_answer:
Hi,

Thank you for the review. The Dean Campustown strives to ensure that our staff is well trained and will look into your response thoroughly.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: Nice place for students! The staffs here are always kind and the study room is very quiet. The internet is also fast, even in evenings.
owner_answer: We want to provide an excellent living experience for our residents, so we love to hear what they love about our community. We appreciate your kind words about our team and your feedback about the study room and internet. Thank you for giving us five stars!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: Always heard good things about the Dean and the amenities, especially the hot tub, definitely make the experience worth it!
owner_answer: Paula, we are thrilled to know that we live up to our reputation! It is wonderful that you enjoy our amenities and hot tub. Thank you for your comments!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: Great apartment, rooms are spacious, kitchen is very useful. I would also say the sauna is my favorite amenity.
owner_answer: Daniel, it is great to hear that you are happy with your apartment home and are enjoying some of our amenities. Thank you for the 5-star review!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: I signed a lease for next year and it was very easy to talk to management to figure out any questions my group had! So excited to live here :)
owner_answer: Jabr, we aim to provide superior customer care and are so happy that you were pleased with our efforts. Thank you for choosing us!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: The atmosphere is very welcoming and the location is ideal. The staff here are also very nice and helpful! I stopped by and I hope to rent at some point in the future. Highly recommend checking out the Dean!
owner_answer:
Hi Jakob,

Thank you for the kind review and experiences. The Dean Campustown hopes that you enjoyed your stay.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text:
my daughter has been locked out TWICE this month bc of their defective equipment.  We are one month in a VERY UNHAPPY with the lack of support - $$$$ + and TWICE her safety has been compromised bc of their equipment not working and NO ONE available to help her after the leasing office hours.
FYI - I have to give a one star review or this will not post

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: I really enjoyed living here! The staff was awesome, made me very comfortable. I would highly recommend
owner_answer: Riley, we work hard to make this a great place to call home and are delighted that you felt comfortable here. Thank you for your kind words about our team and for sharing your experience!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: The Dean is AMAZING! My move in experience was awesome. It was a fast and smooth process and they also provided movers. The amenities are a plus. The staff is great and very knowledgeable.
owner_answer: Rogelio V, we're happy you found our staff to be so supportive during your experience here at The Dean Campustown. We strive for 100% satisfaction. Please let us know if anything comes up that we can help assist with. Have a wonderful day!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: The Dean has been very accommodating with fixing any issues that we have had with our apt or answering any questions we have. Candy in particular has been super helpful with packages that have been sent to the leasing office as well as being super quick with work orders.
owner_answer: Alex Bancila, we strive for 100% satisfaction, and it is great to see you had such a positive experience at The Dean Campustown. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist with!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: Personally I would like to thank Cheyenne for assisting me in finding an apartment after knowing I moved from out of state. Not only was Chyenne professional, she was very supportive in making sure I found the right place to live by notifying me of the amenities and luxuries that came with living here. She made me feel valued as a resident and that why I was happy to have her help me on this journey.
owner_answer: Chantel Pinnock, thank you for your kind review; we are happy to pass along your comments to the team here at The Dean Campustown! We hope you are loving your new home!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: Property looked great! Has a great modern design and is close to so many retail spaces. Cheyenne did an amazing job with her customer service. Never met someone who is so bubbly and great at what she does!
owner_answer: John Smith, we strive for 100% satisfaction, and it is great to see you had such a positive experience at The Dean Campustown!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text:
This place is an absolute sham. Don't judge a book by its cover cause The Dean looks beautiful from the outside but is littered with issues. Inconsistent wifi, closed amenities, and unresponsive management.

And to top it all off they are paying for fake 5 star reviews.
owner_answer:
Hi Dan,

We are disappointed to learn of your experience here at The Dean Campustown, but will take this opportunity to improve. The Dean Campustown wants to ensure residents enjoy their stay and helps to resolve any issues.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: I have been living here for about half of a year and there were many frustrating things like the internet going out a lot and poor responsiveness of the staff however they have fixed most of these things and now it is a pretty nice place to live! However the maintenance is still super slow. They never do anything unless you go tell the front desk multiple times.
owner_answer: Hi Sam Swain, we appreciate your honest review. We set a high standard for ourselves, so we are disappointed to hear that your experience with us was not a positive one. Thank you again for taking the time to let us know how we can improve.  We'd like the opportunity to turn your experience around. Please reach out to us at (217) 689-1111 at your earliest convenience to discuss how we can turn this experience into a positive one.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: With everything going on in the world I was definitely uneasy with my move in ESPECIALLY coming in from out of state. Thankfully the staff was so supportive and willing to help me with all my questions, worries, and inquiries I’ve had. I also want to give a shout out to a member of the staff Cheyenne for taking the time out to make sure my move in went smoothly! She answered all my questions and more!
owner_answer: Xavier Malaret, we are glad we could help ease the process of move-in and answer all your questions and concerns. Our team strives to deliver an excellent experience, and are glad you found this to be the case in your time with us thus far. If you have further needs or questions, please reach out!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: PLEASE DONT BELIEVE THE POSITIVE  POST!!! They are NOT real!!! The students at the front desk, try to help, but pass on info to “manager”, which you never see or hear from. Problems take forever to get resolved IF they even do. Showers flooded bathroom for months til somewhat fixed. Maintenance, who is never the same person, never gives notice that they are coming. Knock & come in. Do they not know students live here & we are taking classes & tests online!! They rushed to finish building & too make mistakes made. NOT worth the money!!!
owner_answer: We are disappointed to learn of your experience here at The Dean Campustown, but will take this opportunity to improve.

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: Last time I stopped by the Dean's office I worked with Max. Max was very polite and informative while assisting me with my question. It was an overall improved customer service experience compared to my previous visits to the Dean, and I hope to see him again next time I need assistance.
owner_answer: Hi John Weiss, We're so happy we were able to help you out! We will be sure to pass these comments along to our team. We are always more than happy to assist you if anything else comes up. Take care!

name: The Dean Campustown
review_text: Great location! Love the amenities and all the little events the building hosts. Very secure building. Highly recommend
owner_answer: Sadeen, your recommendation means so much to us! We appreciate the feedback about the events in our community and are delighted that you enjoy them. Thank you for your wonderful comments!

name: The Dean Campustown
