name: Seven07
review_text: Best place to live on campus! Awesome location and amazing amenities!
owner_answer: Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback! We're thrilled to hear that you love the location and amenities. Your satisfaction is our utmost priority, and reviews like yours make our day. Thank you for choosing us as your home away from home!

name: Seven07
review_text: This place is overrated. I had decided to live here because I heard good things about it, but unfortunately the hype was wrong. Everything looks nice on paper, but over the last 6 months it has been more irritating than comforting to live here. Maybe I'm just unlucky and some parts won't apply to others but I'm just reporting my experience. Starting with amenities, I feel like nothing works when you need it to. Whenever I need to use the printer, it's broken. My washing machine repeatedly fails to drain the water out. The security system sometimes doesn't recognize your key. In fact, the night I came back from winter break, I would've been locked out of the building had it not been for someone else coming out. For fall finals, I unexpectedly had to rush down 14 flights of stairs to catch a morning final because they hadn't reactivated the elevators due to an alarm the night before; I feel like 8am isn't too early to restart them, no? Shouldn't they know it's finals week and be mindful of certain things? While I was off campus, my room has been entered on multiple occasions without good reason or my permission or awareness, with one of those times leading to something of mine being lost despite them claiming they had nothing to do with it. And finally, the lack of hot water. As you may have seen other reviews have mentioned the staff's inability to upkeep hot water, especially during a snow storm. Thank you for having us wait over a week, I appreciate it. I also just randomly don't get hot water. Some days you just need a nice shower after a long day, but some days you really just can't. It's all these things that add up that make me wish I had lived somewhere else. I certainly won't be returning. 707's a pathetic joke. Go anywhere else.
owner_answer: Eli, thank you for your feedback. It is our goal is to provide the best possible service and we are truly sorry that your experience was less than satisfactory.  Our team would be happy to speak with you and resolve the issues you are having. Please contact us at 217-294-6260 or stop by the leasing office at your earliest convenience.

name: Seven07
review_text:
Guys… just run away from this garbage place asap and DO NOT sign with them! There was no hot water for a long time, and no compensation was made. How hard is it to get hot water? Despite the building looks new, its walls are thin and you can hear your neighbors from up/downstairs when they talk or even walk. Also, their staff act nice until something’s wrong in ur apartment, they become super rude and they won’t solve any of your problems. They would charge you a lot more money if the furniture in ur apt broke. Oh also, my packages and food delivery were lost/stolen for so many times, and the staff won’t do anything to help, or let u go through security footage. What a “nice” place to live in! Full of thieves, no hot water, super noisy everyday… who would like to live in such cold place with those cold hearted staff?
P.S, Also, Don’t trust those 5-star reviews, they are all rated by their staff. How brilliant of you to use your staff’s real names to leave reviews lol.
owner_answer: Vivian, We are sorry to hear about your disappointing experience with us.  It's always our intention to provide great customer service.  Thank you for reaching out.  Your valuable feedback helps us improve our processes and better serve our residents.  Please reach out to us at 217-294-6260 to discuss how we can make this right.

name: Seven07
review_text: This apartment building is absolutely wonderful. I’ve only lived here for a week and already I love it. Their facilities are pristine, the staff are super friendly, and their rooms are well maintained. Already I have several anecdotes about times that the staff were really nice to me, like the first day I left my keys at the front desk (just super tired from moving) and one of the staff members texted me saying that they had my keys and that they were safe and not to worry. If you can afford living here, I’d totally recommend it.
owner_answer: Lizzy - your kind words are appreciated and we are sure glad we were able to get your keys back to you on that stressful and exhausting day!

name: Seven07
review_text:
Overall, I'd say that the overall experience here is subpar/acceptable, at the very least. Although the amenities such as the gym, basketball courts, and pool are pretty nice, those are all that I can think of as being "good". During my period living here, there have been so many issues/red flags. Hopefully, my review can help you rethink and really consider if this is the place that you will want to stay at.

My main concerns come as issues with Seven07 management. In my opinion, they have not been doing a good job at all keeping up with resolving any of the tenants' issues. There was the whole no-hot water situation, where they did the absolute absolute bare minimum to stay within regulations and not get into any trouble. In the first few days where there was no hot water, nothing was done at all. As residents were frustrated with the lack of action, some decided to speak with the Champaign-Urbana Tenant Union, and discuss legal options to resolve the issue. Strangely and interestingly enough, the next day, Seven07 staff put out a notice that they would be implementing a shuttle service to take residents to ARC for showers. It seems quite obvious that they are doing the bare minimum to not get sued, and won't take action unless forced to. Also, they supposedly voted to not provide compensation for the lack of hot water, even though it is clearly on them for not resolving the issue in a timely fashion. I can understand that they want to reduce the overhead and maximize margins, but I will just say this now, they may have "saved costs" but at the expense of their tenants' trust. I, along with others, have sent numerous emails asking for details about the compensation and at the time of this writing, over three months have passed, and not a single word has been said. They are trying to brush this off and hope residents forget about it, which goes to show how much they care about your experience as a tenant. One other thing that is indicative of poor management is how they also handle the persistent internet issues. Even though residents from all over the building are reporting the same, consistent issues with the internet connection being spotty, they still want each individual resident to call the internet service provider. Logically speaking, if residents from literally almost every part of apartment are experiencing similar internet connectivity issues, I think that it might just be a larger problem here. It seems that they just do not want to put in the effort to fix these problems.
**My concerns with the management team do not extend to any of the student members. They have been doing a great job, and are always friendly and willing to help.

If Seven07 reads this, and decides to post the same comment saying that I should contact their office, please know that I have already sent numerous emails, and have never gotten a response. I hope to keep this review up to share my experience and provide a different perspective on what leasing an apartment here would entail.
owner_answer: Alvin, We realize Seven07 fell short of your resident expectations as well as the level of service you received.  We are sincerely sorry.  Thank you for your honest review.  Please know your feedback will be used to improve our service.

name: Seven07
review_text:
I NEVER get hot water here. This has been an issue since the beginning of the school year in August 2021. Fast forward to February 2022 and it’s gotten much worse. It’s freezing cold water! There have been instances where I’ve had to shower in the cold water because I had no choice. People have things to do, and worrying about hot water is BY NO MEANS one of those things.
I’ve set up work orders to get it fixed last year and a few weeks ago when I came back in January after break. They came around 4 days after I submitted my work order, and then when they came nothing changed. I also called management but that hasn’t changed anything. I spoke to the leasing manager Brian, and he just asked me why I didn’t place a work order before. First of all, I did place work orders before and second of all, that doesn’t solve my problem. I’m having this problem for a long time, so I would obviously call you. They just tell you the following things from their laundry list of responses: turn your water on for 30 minutes, no one else is having this issue, it’s the weather’s fault. Yeah right. My roommates and I have left the water on for more than 30 minutes and that does NOT do anything (not to mention that it’s a waste of water). With the winter storm, they found out that they need replacement parts for the boiler system. That should’ve been checked well in advance so that this problem wouldn’t arise again in the first place. What’s funny is that the management wasn’t even in the building when there was a cold water outage for us in November because of a shift in management. They have a track record of leaving the building when something goes wrong. Oh, and don’t get me started on the weekly fire alarms, one of them being at 6 am. I absolutely do NOT recommend living here as it is not worth taking showers in freezing cold water. Save your money and find another place.
owner_answer: Dev, thank you for your feedback. We want to assure we are working diligently to get this resolved as soon as possible. Please reach out to our office team for the initiatives we have put in place in the interim. Thank you again and we look forward to hearing from you!

name: Seven07
review_text: Good spot. Elevators mess up sometimes though

name: Seven07
review_text: If you see a good review for this apartment it’s probably paid for by management. This place is horrible to live in. The fire alarm goes off every week and it happens like 3 times a day sometimes. There was an actual fire on the roof of the building too. The outside and the amenities look good but it’s made with cheap material. The maintenance people are very incompetent as well as not take you seriously. Also they don’t even have running hot water most of the time. Management pretends like they can’t do anything about the issues and pretend like they can’t fix the problems. DO NOT LIVE HERE!!!!
owner_answer: Paul, thank you for your feedback. It is our goal is to provide the best possible service and we are truly sorry that your experience was less than satisfactory.  Our team would be happy to discuss your concerns further. Please contact us at 217-294-6260 or stop by the leasing office at your earliest convenience.

review_text:
Decent building, many many issues tho. Walls are very thin, you'll hear everything. No closets in the rooms for whatever reason... and hit water has been out for around 4 days now, extremely annoying and unacceptable for the price were paying

Feb 2022 update:
Our apartment had been missing the microwave for over 2 weeks, and we've had outright no hot water for at least 5 days, and that is on top of the hot water not working half the time, we usually have to leave the shower on for at least 10 minutes to get some sort of lukewarm water...

review_text: It’s a really good place, it make me feel like home.

name: Seven07
review_text: Great customer service, amazing apartment complex very modern. I love everything about this building! All of the people are nice and friendly, looking forward to staying here again next year!

name: Seven07

name: Seven07
review_text: I’ve seen Seven07 build from the ground up and it is truly an amazing building on campus. The amenities are one of a kind and make living that much more enjoyable. Staff is also super friendly and accommodating where they can be. I loved living here during my last year of undergrad and miss it already!
owner_answer: Anisha - we sure miss you too! We wish you the absolute best in your future endeavors. If one of your future pursuits should end up being grad school, we'd love to have you back!

name: Seven07
review_text: It's a shame that this place got away with absolutely ripping off their tenants and are allowed to continue under current management. These people cannot run a coffee machine without messing up let alone an entire building in the heart of campus. No hot water in the midst of winter, lack of cleaning,  terrible maintenance response time.
owner_answer: Thank you for your feedback, Andrew.  The hot water issue has been resolved after diligent collaboration with the city and third party professionals. We have taken additional steps to optimize our boiler systems' efficiency and continue to monitor closely.  We have a cleaning service on-site Monday-Friday.  We would be happy to address any cleaning concerns you might have.  The Seven07 Maintenance Team works very hard on closing out any maintenance requests within a 24-hour period.  Sometimes it may take longer given the amount of requests they have for the week or maybe an issue with the supply chain.  We would be happy to discuss any of these issues further with you.  Please feel free to stop by our office or call us at 217.294.6260.

name: Seven07
review_text: We have not had hot water for the past week and many others have not had it for even several months. Our WiFi speeds have gotten so slow that you get kicked out of Zoom during classes. The walls are so thin that you can hear everything and they don't answer the phone when you call them for late night noise complaints. Fire alarms happen every 1-2 weeks. They also haven't even bothered to clean the first floor and the entire area is full of dirt. The management at the front desk seems to have mysteriously disappeared when the recent hot water issue started appearing and everyone's packages are out for display. Please do not sign here.
owner_answer: Sayrav, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We would love to discuss further so that we can resolve any issues you may be having. Please reach out to 217.294.6260 at your earliest convenience.

name: Seven07
review_text: Such a great place to live at. The amenities are super nice! Everything is always so clean looks almost spotless!!
owner_answer: Hi Kaitlyn.  Thank you so much for your positive feedback!  We're thrilled to hear you are enjoying your home at Seven07.

name: Seven07
review_text: Seven 07 has some of the best staff I’ve ever seen. They are all so awesome, friendly, and ready to help. The building itself is so amazing and clean!
owner_answer: Thank you, Sophia, for sharing your experience with us!

name: Seven07
review_text: Great place to live!! The amenities are great,location is awesome it's walking distance from everything, and the staff is amazing and always kind and respectful.
owner_answer: Thank you so much for the great review, Danielle! We’re glad you are happy living at Seven07.  If there is anything else we can do for you, please let us know.

name: Seven07
review_text: Terrible place. It looks great at first but it’s just a pretty exterior. However, we haven’t gotten consistent water ever since we moved in. They ask us to leave the shower on for 30+ minutes just to get luke warm water. Wasteful and a major inconvenience. The management is rude and especially Brian laughs when we go down with our issues. Haven’t met a single person who’s happy living here so don’t believe any of the good reviews
owner_answer: Saakshitha, thank you for your feedback. We want to assure we are working diligently to get this resolved as soon as possible. Please reach out to our office team for the initiatives we have put in place in the interim. Thank you again and we look forward to hearing from you!

name: Seven07
review_text: The managers and staff are friendly and outgoing from the second you walk into the door. As a resident, the rooms are all up to date and super nice, with access to great amenities on top of that, as well as easy access to everything on campus. Would definitely recommend Seven07 to anyone looking for a place to stay on campus!
owner_answer: Jake - we very much appreciate your kind words and we hope you have a great experience here at Seven07 this year!

name: Seven07
review_text: I think I have to leave a negative comment here. The hot water supply is so disappointing that we usually have to wait for over 15 minutes, leaving the water faucet open, to get hot water. AND, for this winter storm period, we have almost NO hot water supply for over two days till now. Besides that, the privacy is a problem between you and your roommates: the wall is not stopping and sound or similar vibration spreading among the rooms(the air conditioner tube also makes contribution to this). Also, the music from a nearby night club could annoy you until two every night. Those glass and wall couldn't help you isolate from outer environment.
owner_answer: Ruochen, thank you for your feedback. We are working diligently to resolve the situation and will continue to keep our residents updated. Our office team would be happy to discuss this further with you. Please don’t hesitate to reach out at 217.294.6260.

name: Seven07
review_text:
All the good reviews here are bought out, or more precisely the leasing manager is giving Dunkin’ Donuts to people for writing good google reviews.
This place has had many issues since we have moved in but there had been a persisting hot water issue that I along with my three other flatmates have been facing over the past year. We have actively been in communication with the Seven07 management and maintenance team for 8 months about this problem in our apartment's water heating system.  Our apartment just NEVER gets supplied hot water and management has known about it but dismissed our pleas to get the issue fixed.
However, of course since the snowstorm on 2nd Feb, the entire building is facing a crisis and there is no hot water in the entire building. The management team who I have contacted multiple times has given me vague answers and has not been able to provide me a timeline to when the problem will be solved still.
The current living conditions in this building are in code violation of the city tenant rights due to the negligence of the management.
Also the managers especially Brian are quite rude when you try to talk about this issue.
owner_answer: Manvi - Our reviews are honest reviews from our residents/prospects.  We encourage ALL reviews, good or bad.  We can assure you, we  are working diligently to resolve the situation and will continue to keep our residents updated daily via email.

name: Seven07
review_text: Water is a basic human right and not only did the building not have hot water but the management did little to remedy the situation. To have a warm shower students had to go to friends apartments or the recreation center. My brother was sick with covid during part of this time and couldn’t leave his apartment. So, he was stuck for multiple days on end in his apartment with no access to warm water- making an already bad illness worse. Such an awful experience and building. Unforgivable.

name: Seven07
review_text: Cozy place and fantastic maintenance! Nick is great!
owner_answer: We're glad to have you here! Thanks for sharing your experience, Logan.

name: Seven07
review_text: Cheap Building packaged to be fancy. Paper walls and wooden structure. Units are not sound proof, you can hear your neighbours walking. Pool area are designed to be noisy for rooms facing south in summer. Poorly designed Plumbing system produces noise at night. Hot water went out on multiple occasions. Takes forever for hot water to come out, have to waste a lot of water everyday. Power and heat went off during winter. Fire alarms often went off falsely, but don't forget their roof did caught fire in the middle of the night. Poorly designed heat/AC systems are inefficient and will give you electric surcharge. temperature in bedrooms and livingroom will be different, bedrooms are super cold in summer, and super hot in winter due to the unbalanced air flow from AC/Heat. The whole utility system is unequipped to handle the needs of the residents. Does not have 24 hrs security, the building stays unmanned for hours every day. If you're looking for a apartment complex with good amenities and location, choose somewhere else with a better and greener building. They may have good  amenities and some good staffs here, but the building and the units just SUCK, and there's nothing they can do about it.
owner_answer: We are fully committed to putting our time and our resources towards providing you with confidence and pride in your living environment. We look forward to meeting with you and working to establish trust in our relationship going forward. We’ll be reaching out shortly to set up a time to meet in person.

name: Seven07
review_text: Seven07 is a great place to live and is located in a great location. Highly recommend living here!
owner_answer: Hi Kennedy! It's lovely to hear that you are enjoying your experience at Seven07! Thanks so much for supporting us with a 5-star review!

name: Seven07
review_text: I was nervous moving from university housing to an apartment. I visited with my older sister and she  remembers wanting to live at seven07 when she went here. We had a tour with a manager named Bryan and he was amazing and answered all our questions.
owner_answer: Thank you, Isabel! We love hearing that you had a great experience with us.

name: Seven07
review_text: I absolutely never leave reviews, but I just can’t get over how professional Brian Jones was while we were trying to get our family member settled in Seven07. He was funn, yet straight forward, answering all of our questions and meeting all of my family needs. Amazing work! THANK YOU!
owner_answer: Don, your review has given us warm hearts today!  Thank you for the kind words...your experience is the one we wish to deliver to all our residents here at Seven07.  Best wishes for a great future!

name: Seven07
review_text: Overpriced, under-built. Simply not worth over $1000 a month. Hot water is notoriously unreliable, and the rooms are small for the price. They quite literally "cut corners" during construction, I sliced my hand open on the underside of the "kitchen table" several times this year. Not to mention they towed my roommate's vehicle which displayed a 707 tag. To their credit, the gym and sauna were fantastic. Consider other living arrangements.
owner_answer: Aaron, first of all, we'd like to apologize to both you and your roommate for experiences that obviously fell far short of what we strive for here at Seven07. We acknowledge that the hot water issue was frustrating for many of our residents. Multiple attempts to correct the issue were necessary, and we're very sorry. Rest assured that no one wanted this resolved permanently more than we did, and we believe that to be the case now. Again, we sure do understand your frustrations and we have taken your points to heart and will be making every effort possible to correct them and make the experience better for our residents. Thank you.

name: Seven07
review_text: I love the events they host in the lobby- makes coming home always an interesting experience. Building is also beautiful.
owner_answer: Hi Kevin.  Thank you so much for the kind words.  Our goal is to create a good living experience, and it sounds like we have done just that.  We are happy to hear you love living at Seven07!

name: Seven07
review_text: Beautiful apartments located within walking distance from the school. The amenities are awesome. The best customer service from Michael.
owner_answer: Thank you, Karen! We love hearing that you enjoy living with us, and we love that you are here at Seven07!!

name: Seven07
review_text: You get no hot water for a month in peak winter after paying rent for a ‘premium apartment’. The management gives you no compensation although you had informed them there was a problem with hot water for the past 6 months where it took 10 minutes for you get hot water after turning the tap on and they did nothing about it until at the start of February, hot water stopped coming altogether.
owner_answer: Aarav, thank you for your feedback. We are working diligently to resolve the situation and will continue to keep our residents updated. Our office team would be happy to discuss this further with you. Please don’t hesitate to reach out at 217.294.6260.

name: Seven07
review_text: No hot water in the apartment. My bathroom has no hot water from this semester and still do not do any maintenance although I request the maintenance for many times. And these two days during the winter storm, not only my bathroom but the whole apartment has no hot water for two days. I have to use kettle to wash my hair. Besides the Internet here is unstable. When I take the online class, I cannot hear the Professor's voice and being kicked out from zoom many times. I need to use my own data to take the class and surf the Internet.
owner_answer: YZ, thank you for your feedback. We are working diligently to resolve the situation and will continue to keep our residents updated. Our office team would be happy to discuss this further with you. Please don’t hesitate to reach out at 217.294.6260.

name: Seven07
review_text: The tour was very helpful and really showed everything the building had to offer. The pool deck is beautiful and the tulu scooters are very convenient!
owner_answer: Hi Andrew, thanks for the feedback! We are glad you enjoyed the TULU scooters. Our residents love them!

name: Seven07
review_text:
I'm not sure how someone rated Seven07 a 5 star because trust me, its not worth the price you pay to live here. I normally do not write reviews but I've had it with this apartment complex. To begin, the hot water in my unit has stopped working four times since I have lived here, each time lasting 2 to 3 days. I pay nearly $1000 a month to worry about having hot water? Please. Furthermore, the rooms are poorly built, with handles breaking off and doors not fitting in the door frame. The couch in the living room is a joke and can barely fit anyone over 5'5. Overall, I think Seven07 was built too fast and they are charging an arm and a leg for half the value you would receive from other apartments at similar rent levels.

Don't let a quick tour fool you. This apartment complex was rushed and poorly built, and you won't get to see any of the problems until you've already moved in.
owner_answer: Our resident's comfort is important to us, and we are sincerely sorry that you have experienced multiple problems during your stay at Seven07. We would love to schedule a meeting to document and address your issues and concerns. We look forward to hearing from you and working to resolve your issues. Our management team is in the Leasing Office M-F from 10-6, and can meet with you by appointment. Also, you can contact the management team directly at our community email: liveseven07@assetliving.com.

name: Seven07
review_text: Worst apartment ever. My driver accidentally sent my package to this apartment. When I got there they have already UNPACKED my package and dumped it. And they kept letting me wait just bc they didn’t want to tell me that they dumped my package in front of their potential customers. I just don’t understand why they unpacked my package and THEN dumped it. Thank god I will not live here.
owner_answer: Jie - I am sorry to hear of your experience.  Unfortunately your food delivery had no phone number associated with it nor did we know who the original delivery carrier was.  After sitting out for a while, we tossed it since it did not belong to a resident of our building.  We'd  appreciate the opportunity to talk further with you about this and see where we could improve.  Please call us at 217-294-6260.

name: Seven07
review_text: Great team especially kaitlyn and nikko; always friendly and ready to help!
owner_answer: We're thrilled to hear that Kaitlyn and Nikko made a positive impression on your experience with us. It's always our goal to provide friendly and helpful service. Thanks for taking the time to share your feedback!

name: Seven07
review_text: Great location! You have access to everything you need. I enjoy how close it is to campus as well as Green street. It is very convenient that there are plenty of study areas especially since most of our classes are online.
owner_answer: Jorge - thanks much for mentioning our terrific study spaces. When you couple them with our high-speed internet connection, that makes Seven07 a great place to both take your classes AND study for them!

name: Seven07
review_text: The managers are super friendly and helpful. The amenities are amazing, I especially love the pool and the gym since it never seems to be too crowded. The whole building is always kept very clean, which I appreciate.
owner_answer: Grayson - cleanliness is priority #1 at Seven07 and we're glad you've noticed how hard our maintenance & cleaning staff are working! Thanks for the kind words.

name: Seven07
review_text: I'm sorry it came to writing a review, but best of luck if you signed a lease for next year. I hope you have consistently hot water while they are claiming "premier student housing."
owner_answer: Savannah, thank you for your feedback. It is our goal is to provide the best possible service and we are truly sorry that your experience was less than satisfactory.  We are working diligently to resolve the hot water situation and will continue to keep our residents updated. Our office team would be happy to discuss this further with you. Please don’t hesitate to reach out at 217.294.6260.

name: Seven07
review_text: So far it’s been a very comfortable experience living here! Enjoy the amenities here, especially the rec room:)
owner_answer: Thank you, Priya! We love hearing that you enjoy living with us, and we love that you are here at Seven07!!

name: Seven07
review_text: Great place to live, quick walk to campus and all the food places are right there on Green Street. Amenities and gym are very nice. It really is the best place to live on campus, especially with most classes online right now.
owner_answer: Zander - Thank you so much for your kind words. Seven07 truly is the best place to live on campus!

name: Seven07
review_text: Great apartment complex, clean, taken care of well. Very nice gym!
owner_answer: Hi Cam, Thank you so much for your positive feedback! We're glad to have you again next year as a Renewal Resident! Please let us know if you need anything!

name: Seven07
review_text: Give this place a two because the amenities are very nice, and definetely one of the highest quality apartments availabe on campus. However, the staff make this place horrible. Used to work here and the price you pay is not worth the service you're getting. Abby Hays is probably the rudest person I met and does not do her job professionally. All in all, very cliquey work environment and super unprofessional, which makes it less enjoyable for residents.

name: Seven07
review_text: This apartment is right up my ally. It's modern and well located. I love the room size and all the great amenities. It get's no better than this!
owner_answer: Thank you, Monique, for this lovely review!  We look forward to seeing you in the Fall.

name: Seven07
review_text: Best apartment ever! Everyone is so friendly and willing to help. I will definitely be coming back here.
owner_answer: Thanks so much for taking the time to leave us a 5-star rating, Nicole – it’s much appreciated!

name: Seven07
review_text: The management is garbage! We haven’t had consistent hot water since we moved in and the management nor the owner could care less. They give the same answers everytime and never bothered to fix the boilers. Would not lease here!
owner_answer: Parth, thank you for your feedback. We are working diligently to resolve the situation and will continue to keep our residents updated. Our office team would be happy to discuss this further with you. Please don’t hesitate to reach out at 217.294.6260.

name: Seven07
review_text: Nick was very helpful in answering my questions about the leasing process
owner_answer: Thank you for sharing your experience! We are glad to hear that all your questions were answered and the process was streamlined.

name: Seven07
review_text: Signed a lease with Sven07, the process was really easy! Super excited to be living there! Looking forward to using the amazing facilities and interacting with the staff!
owner_answer: Julieth - we're excited too!  Each year we look forward to our new residents and coming up with creative ways to make your experience here a positive one.  See you in the Fall!

name: Seven07
review_text: Amazing place with such great amenities! Only apartment on campus with a basketball court inside the building. Also such a wonderful staff they have.
owner_answer: Josh, thank you for leaving this detailed feedback about your experience with Seven07.

name: Seven07
review_text: This place is a great place to live and the amenities are really nice, especially the gym. It’s definitely worth it!
owner_answer: Simran, Thank you so much for your kind words about Seven07! We are thrilled that you enjoy living at Seven07 and love our 24-hour gym!

name: Seven07
review_text: Since the new management took over seven07 they got very rude and unfriendly. Brian the leasing manager is very unfriendly and was never helpful for questions. They are pretending to be luxurious but they are just the same as the other apartments in Champaign. Wouldn’t recommend going there.
owner_answer: Thank you, Elia, for your honest feedback. We strive for the best customer service and apologize we did not meet the expectation. We’d love to make this up to you and discuss your concerns in person to assure they are taken care of correctly. Please contact us at 217-294-6260 or stop by the leasing office and ask to speak with Abby.

name: Seven07
review_text: This is our first experience as parents moving our student to an apartment.  We had issues with moving from a dorm to an apartment, however, talking with Abby helped calm our worries.  When we moved in the room was clean and  modern.  Abby was outstanding, she was kind and very professional in assisting us in moving into her room.
owner_answer: Mr. Simmons - we're happy to be your daughter's home away from home this Fall! Thank you for the praise. It was our pleasure to make your daughter's transition from dorm to apartment a little easier.

name: Seven07
review_text: I’ve lived at Seven07 for a semester now and can easily say it is one of the nicest apartment buildings on campus! It has great staff, location, and amenities. They welcome everyone and even care for pets!
owner_answer: Joseph - we adore your sweet pup! Just seeing her come through the lobby brings a smile to our faces. Thanks for your kind words - we wish you both could live here forever too!

name: Seven07
review_text: Amazing customer service. The leasing agents are super patient and help out in so many different ways. Management is also very accommodative with COVID-19 and everything that is currently in place. So excited to live here!
owner_answer: Sid - COVID has been a challenge for everyone, but especially for on-campus students! You guys have been rock stars at adjusting to unprecedented changes and we're very happy to facilitate anything on the housing end that makes your life just a little easier during these strange times. Thanks for noticing!

name: Seven07
review_text: Great location and staff is great and helpful. Spacious rooms and high quality utilities
owner_answer: Gwen - Thank you so much for this great 5-star review. We really appreciate you helping to share the word about your living experience here at Seven07.

name: Seven07
review_text: Corrupt. The building lost hot water for almost a month, which broke the lease, and Seven07 did nothing to reimburse the renters. They also actively silenced renters who were trying to collaborate with other renters to petition Seven07 to fix the hot water in a timely fashion.
owner_answer: Brandon - Thanks for sharing your feedback. We’re sorry your experience didn’t match your expectations. It was an uncommon instance and we have new measures in place to avoid this situation in the future.  Please feel free to reach out to us with any further comments, concerns, or suggestions you wish to share.

name: Seven07
review_text: Perfection 🙌🏼💜. I love it a nice place to stay very clean nice ppl that lives in the building can’t go wrong with that
owner_answer: Marlon, we are so glad to hear that you love living at Seven07.  Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5-star review. Your feedback is greatly appreciated."

name: Seven07
review_text: Move in was great.  Staff was friendly and very helpful. My room was clean and spacious.  The gym and pool area are amazing.  Location is perfect!
owner_answer: We are happy to have you here, Sarah! Thank you for sharing your experience.

name: Seven07
review_text: The experience so far at seven07 has been amazing. The staff have been very helpful with providing help and information. Definitely recommend living here.
owner_answer: Thanks for your feedback Rishikesh. The team here at Seven07 appreciates it!

name: Seven07
review_text: Great experience with the staff. The made the moving in process extremely easy and answered all the questions I had when leasing the apartment.

name: Seven07
review_text: Great tour! Beautiful unit! and Great customer service! Easy application process and thorough explanations! Great experience overall!
owner_answer: Jodi, thank you for leaving this detailed feedback about your experience with Seven07. Thank you very much for sharing these comments.

name: Seven07
review_text: This place is great, clean, and has great employees. I put in a maintenance request and they completed it in the same day!
owner_answer: Andrew - Thanks so much for sharing your feedback about Seven07.  We're glad to hear that our Maintenance Team's performance exceeded your expectations.  We are glad to have you here at Seven07!

name: Seven07
review_text: Great building everyone who works there is amazing with good attitudes, The building it’s self is beautiful nice architecture
owner_answer: Thank you so much for the 5-star review!  We're so happy to hear your living experience at Seven07 has been nothing short of great!

name: Seven07
review_text: During the storm, it stopped hot water for more than 48 hours! You don't have access to a shower! And they have a very slow internet connection!
owner_answer: Yizhen, thank you for your feedback. We are working diligently to resolve the situation and will continue to keep our residents updated. Our office team would be happy to discuss this further with you. Please don’t hesitate to reach out at 217.294.6260.

name: Seven07
review_text: The people working are very nice and helpful. The rooms are well maintained and I highly recommend having an apartment at Seven07

name: Seven07
review_text: Awesome apartment building in a great spot on campus! All the amenities you need and conveniently close to restaurants as well as classes on the quad.
owner_answer: Vazquez - Thank you for such an amazing review of Seven07.  We are thrilled to hear you are enjoying all the amenities.

name: Seven07
review_text: This is my 2nd year at Seven07 and I have been happy with the whole experience. The location on campus and amenities offered make it a great place for student living!
owner_answer: Drew - Your kind words have made us smile today.  We too are happy you chose Seven07 as your home two years in a row!

name: Seven07
review_text: They try to say that it is a luxury community apartment but everything in the entire building is a cheap as possible. Our fridge shelf broke the day we moved in, and our HDMI port in our wall fell out constantly among other things. The fire alarm went off constantly. When we signed our lease, we were told we were getting gift cards upon moving in but they took months to arrive and could only be used in select places. Their community events were half baked and nobody showed up. When we moved out, they told us we didn’t have to clean thoroughly then proceeded to charge us for every minor scuff on the wall. The whole experience felt like a scam. Live somewhere else.
owner_answer: We regret that you have had an unpleasant experience. Resident satisfaction is extremely important to us and we're sorry that we fell short of your expectations. We'll work hard to address each of the issues you identified and make improvement for our future residents.

name: Seven07
review_text: I really enjoyed living here! I think everything about the apartment is beautiful and I believe the staff has done everything they can to make sure my stay was amazing!
owner_answer: Abdullah - your outgoing personality and infectious smile is one of the bright spots of our first year at Seven07! Best of luck to you in Grad School!

name: Seven07
review_text: the management team is so helpful! the amenities are PERFECT, you never have to leave the building. They made my leasing process so simple and stress free!!!
owner_answer: Stress-free leasing is one of our top priorities - so we're beyond thrilled that you were able to experience that, Taylor. Thank you for being a positive influence in our community!

name: Seven07
review_text: It’s a great place to live

name: Seven07
review_text: My view is a cinder block wall. Hot water was MIA. I've lived here since only January, and the one good thing I can admit about it is the ping pong table. Find somewhere else to live.

name: Seven07
review_text: Seven07 is such an awesome place to live! Their amenities are great and their staff and maintenance members are great. They are really on top of any requests given to them. I recommend living here!

name: Seven07
review_text: It’s a beautifully kept building, with really helpful managers. The amenities are top notch & always kept really clean. The location is unbeatable, everything I need is within walking distance.

name: Seven07
review_text: Definitely one, if not the best, off campus apartments in the area. Staff is amazing and friendly. Very safe building as well!

review_text: I got some packages delivered that came early. Since I was home from winter break, one of the staff, Michael, put my packages in my unit and really helped me out

name: Seven07
review_text: I really enjoy working out at gym. It is really comfortable place to live.

review_text: Tour went very well. Super informative and detailed. JC was a great tour guide!
owner_answer: JessiicaMazur, thank you for leaving this detailed feedback about your experience with Seven07. Thank you very much for sharing these comments.

review_text: Kait is the best, ever.. Thanks

review_text: Love the layout! Very friendly staff and the gym is a major plus

review_text: Seven 07 has great staff and if you have a problem they are always willing to to help.  I’m thankful for living somewhere nice and spacious.

name: Seven07
review_text: I think the lobby area is really beautiful but the thing that’s my favorite is the gym. It overlooks the street and the equipment is very nice.

name: Seven07
review_text: JC gave an amazing tour. Answered all of my questions. Was very thorough. Super helpful. Informational!

name: Seven07
review_text: The location is perfect and has tons of restaurant options near by. The building is always clean and the staff are always so helpful.
owner_answer: Manylay - We are humbled by your kind words and promise to do all we can to continue to make your experience here an amazing one!

The building is built cheap, many furniture break easily and they would charge you way more than the repair fee. And it is super noisy. NO HOT WATER after 10 pm, asked them to fixed it but nothing has been done...for a year! Also, Abby Hays is the rudest staff ever. She does literally nothing only repeats that she is not responsible. Useless. I am sure that you could find better and cheaper apartments on campus.

name: Legacy202 Apartments
review_text:
This building is truly a testament to how much of a difference quality service can make to your living experience. Throughout my time at Legacy202, the staff has always been courteous and proactive - not something that can be said about many luxury apartments in town (speaking from experience). When I was struggling to find someone to sublease my apartment to, the manager Chris and her staff were able to assist me in a timely and efficient manner.

On top of the service, the building is always kept pristine and clean (again, that cannot be said about other luxury apartments in town from my experiences). The lobby is always perfectly maintained and clean, as well as all the other (amazing) amenities offered. The apartments have phenomenal floor plans and great finishes throughout. Maintenance is also fast and efficient.

If you are looking for an apartment near campus, this is THE place to be! :)
